column4: he everyone can someone help me get my Dlink wireless card working?  ive tried for a week
i meant hey everyone
hullo, can someone help me with my wireless card?
hullo, can someone help me with my wireless card?
can you type ifconfig in your terminal?
i will try,
so it says your wireless card is working
it also says you have an ip address
you there?
what version of ubuntu are you running, and are you running gnome or kde?
do you see other ssids?
if you put the mouse over your wireless item up in the top right hand side of the menu, do you see other ssids?
do you see yours?
then the reason you cannot connect is because you have a wep key or something
did you put the key in for the wpa?
no, use the gui
its easier
wpa is picky, let me look at it for a second
that is how you configure it, manual
since you already have a good signal coming in, it will automatically connect after you exit x, which is control alt backspace
reboot then
you cant be on wired, and configure the wireless, it conflicts with the mac address
no prob
